I've been looking to add a code coverage tool to my new project's
toolkit..=
. Was looking at JCoverage, Clover, etc so this thread is
very well-timed!
=

I'm not hugely familiar with EMMA... Found the site easily enough...
Wonde=
ring if anyone here is using Maven2 + JUnit + EMMA and has any
advice to of=
fer? Or a sample pom.xml? :-)

Wayne

re

ght now.  EMMA does everything we've

ny design to change.
